name: Ablat
description: <!-- Summary Start -->Ablat is a material which ablates (vaporizes) when hit by laser fire. The vaporized material carries away the energy of the laser, protecting the user. Ablat has a basic protective value against attacks and is doubled against K (Burn) attacks. Ar 12<!-- Summary End -->

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Assault Armor, Heavy
description: <!-- Summary Start -->Darrian pre-Maghiz suit of combat armor. Ar 32 (MgT 16).<!-- Summary End --> Assault armor is a relatively lightweight system intended for short-term (hours) operations against an enemy force.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Battledress
description:
<!-- Summary Start -->Heavy powered personal armor Ar 45 (MgT 18)<!-- Summary End -->Battledress is a standard combat uniform worn by soldiers. Over time, the Dress element has become the term for the ultimate in military powered armor.

The significant element of Dress is that it is braced against high recoil.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Boarding Armor
description: <!-- Summary Start -->Boarding armor for use in zero-G operations against interplanetary and interstellar vessels. AV 28 (MgT 15)<!-- Summary End -->

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Coat
description: <!-- Summary Start -->A basic cold weather clothing unit.<!-- Summary End -->

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Cloth Armor
description: <!-- Summary Start -->A heavy duty body suit tailored from ballistic cloth. Ar 14 (MgT 12)<!-- Summary End -->

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Combat Armor
description: <!-- Summary Start -->Combat Armor is intended for medium-term operations (days) against an enemy force. Ar 28 (MgT 15).<!-- Summary End -->

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Desert Cloak
description: <!-- Summary Start -->A basic fabric article of clothing which provides a degree of protection against the desert environment. Ar 1.<!-- Summary End -->

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Hostile Environment Suit
description: <!-- Summary Start -->The hostile environment suit includes a variety of protections against extreme envronmental conditions. Ar 16 (MgT 13).<!-- Summary End -->

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Jack
description: <!-- Summary Start -->A natural or synthetic leather jacket or body suit covering the torso and upper arms and legs. Jack is somewhat better than ordinary clothing in providing basic protection. Ar 5<!-- Summary End -->

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Mesh
description: <!-- Summary Start -->A jacket or body suit made of natural or synthetic leather and reinforced with a lining of flexible metal mesh, similar to chain mail but lighter and stronger. Ar 10<!-- Summary End -->

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Quilted Armor
description: <!-- Summary Start -->Improved ballistic cloth. Ar 18 (MgT 13)<!-- Summary End -->

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
